# Tools 

## Wallets
A wallet is the primary way you interact with a [Blockchain](../technical/blockchains.qmd). 

Wallets have the following major attributes:

* Type - Hardware or Software wallets
* Platform - Mobile, Browser, Desktop or Hybrid
* [Application Model](../technical/blockchains.qmd#application-models) - Type of blockchains it supports. Can support multiple models. 

| Wallet Name | Type | Platform | Application Models Supported | Notes |
|-------------|------|-----------|----------------------------|--------|
| Ledger | Hardware | Desktop (via Ledger Live), Mobile (via Ledger Live) | Account (EVM), UTXO, Specialized Account, Resource, Actor | - Secure element chip protection<br>- Supports 5000+ tokens<br>- Multi-currency support through apps |
| Trezor | Hardware | Desktop (via Trezor Suite), Browser | Account (EVM), UTXO, Specialized Account | - Open source hardware<br>- Built-in crypto exchange<br>- Password manager integration |
| MetaMask | Software | Browser Extension, Mobile | Account (EVM) | - Industry standard for EVM chains<br>- Built-in swap functionality<br>- Extensive dApp integration |
| Phantom | Software | Browser Extension, Mobile | Capability (Solana), Account (EVM) | - Native Solana integration<br>- Recently added EVM support<br>- NFT management focused |
| Safe | Software | Browser (Web App) | Account (EVM) | - Multi-signature focused<br>- Modular architecture<br>- DAO treasury management<br>- Programmable accounts |
| TrustWallet | Software | Mobile | Account (EVM), UTXO, Specialized Account | - Multi-chain support<br>- Built-in DeFi browser<br>- Binance integration |
| Rainbow | Software | Mobile | Account (EVM) | - iOS/Android focused<br>- Enhanced NFT support<br>- Optimized for DeFi interactions |
